Découvrez l’impact environnemental de l'.en: Discover the environmental impact for food consumed products

Informations, conditions d’usages et doc.en: Information, terms of use and documentation

Agribalyse, la base de données environne.en: AGRIBALYSE database of environmental impact indicators for food items produced and consumed in France.

2500 produits, 16 indicateurs construits.en: AGRIBALYSE provides reference data on 2,500 food products consumed in France (including imported products) based on the Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) method.

Un programme collaboratif associant des.en: Co-piloted by ADEME and INRAE, relying on the collaboration of agricultural and agrifood technical institutes, the AGRIBALYSE program has existed for over 10 years.

Un outil au service des professionnels a.en: One of the main purposes of the AGRIBALYSE® program is to provide data useful for professionals in the agricultural and agrifood sectors (agricultural profession, agrifood industry, mass distribution,...) and final consumers.

Améliorer vos systèmes de productions et.en: Improve your production systems and your range of food products

Aider vos convives dans leurs choix.en: Improve your menus and help your guests in their choices

Communiquer les données environnementale.en: Educate consumers about the sustainability of their food

Vous avez des questions sur le programme.en: You have a question about AGRIBALYSE?

Cette application présente les résultats.en: This application shows the results of the Agribalyse database, according to LCA indicators. It does not show an environmental labelling nor an “eco-score” for the general public.
